solution_line_template: He spends {first_country_weeks}*{multiplier_twice}=<<{first_country_weeks}*{multiplier_twice}={weeks_per_other_country}>>{weeks_per_other_country} weeks in the other two countries

So he spends {num_other_countries}*{weeks_per_other_country}=<<{num_other_countries}*{weeks_per_other_country}={total_weeks_other_countries}>>{total_weeks_other_countries} weeks in those countries combined
That means he is gone for {first_country_weeks}+{total_weeks_other_countries}=<<{first_country_weeks}+{total_weeks_other_countries}={total_trip_weeks}>>{total_trip_weeks} weeks
